data.title: Professional Services Group
data.meta_description: GoldenSource Professional Services Group (PSG) ensures that you get what you needâ€”when you need it. We work with you to ensure you meet business objectives.
data.text:
Well-implemented technology creates lasting value.

GoldenSource Professional Services Group (PSG) provides advice, implementation, and support services to help you maximize the value of your investment in the GoldenSource EDM platform.

We ensure that you can setup and integrate our data management solutions within your systems landscape, make changes and extend its usage for new lines of business, and accommodate new regulations.

GoldenSource maintains dedicated resources to ensure that we can help you at any or every stage of your change program and BAU operations. Our PSG team offers a combination of business analysis, configuration and testing skills alongside expert knowledge of daily operations, regulatory and business domain requirements, plus front-, middle- and back-office systems and technologies.

Decades of combined and shared experience.

The GoldenSource team includes recent industry practitioners to provide insightful services and strategic alignment between requirements and solutions, helping to future-proof your data management capabilities.

With decades of combined and shared experience optimizing the applications delivered through the comprehensive data model and data management functionality within the GoldenSource EDM platform we help you deliver better outcomes and long-lasting results and value.

GoldenSource PSG works in tandem with your internal team and we are always happy to work alongside your trusted external consulting, integration, and outsourcing suppliers.
